caption: Amazing dive at Blue Corner today! Saw a school of hammerhead sharks and the current was perfect. Visibility was incredible at 30m+. Can't wait to come back! ü¶à

comments.comment: Wow! Those hammerheads look incredible. What time of day did you dive?

caption: Manta ray cleaning station was absolutely magical! Three mantas stayed for over 20 minutes. The gentle giants were so graceful. Perfect conditions with 25m visibility.

comments.comment: Mantas are so majestic! Did you see any reef sharks too?

caption: Night dive at Crystal Bay was epic! Spotted a walking shark and so many nudibranchs. The macro life here is unreal. Water temp was perfect at 27¬∞C.
Turtle paradise! Counted 12 green sea turtles on this dive. One was huge - probably 100+ years old. The coral formations were pristine too. üê¢

comments.comment: 12 turtles in one dive?! That's incredible luck!
The old turtle looks so wise! Great shots üì∏

caption: Advanced dive at The Drop Off today. Strong currents but worth it for the pelagic action! Saw white tip reef sharks, eagle rays, and a massive school of barracuda.

comments.comment: The Drop Off is intense! How was the current at depth?
